name: File
description: Represents a file to be installed as part of a component.

Id.description: Unique identifier for the file. Auto-generated from filename if not specified.

Source.description: Path to the source file to include in the installer.

Name.description: The destination filename. Defaults to source filename.

KeyPath.description: If yes, this file is the key path for its component.

Vital.description: If yes, installation fails if this file cannot be installed.

Checksum.description: If yes, the file has a checksum stored in the MsiFileHash table.

ReadOnly.description: If yes, the file is installed with read-only attribute.

Hidden.description: If yes, the file is installed with hidden attribute.

System.description: If yes, the file is installed with system attribute.
